sentence.Network_en: Girls trundle in carrying heavy book bags.
sentence.Network_cn: 背着沉重书包的女孩们慢慢走进来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting a small wheel or roller): a parallel formation to obsolete or dialect trendle, trindle '(cause to) revolve'; related to trend

entry.tran: (车辆)缓缓行进，艰难移动，曲折开进
entry.def: If a vehicle trundles somewhere, it moves there slowly, often with difficulty or an irregular movement.

example.ex: The truck was trundling along the escarpment of the Zambesi valley…
example.tran: 卡车沿着赞比西山谷的绝壁缓缓行进。

example.ex: A few horse-drawn carts still trundle through the dilapidated mining villages…
example.tran: 几架马车仍然在破落的矿村中曲折行进。

entry.tran: 慢慢移动，缓慢滚动(尤指带轮的小体积重物)
entry.def: If you trundle something somewhere, especially a small, heavy object with wheels, you move or roll it along slowly.

example.ex: The old man lifted the barrow and trundled it away...
example.tran: 那个老头提起手推车，慢慢推走了。

example.ex: They trundled his mowers outside and dumped them.
example.tran: 他们把他的除草机全都推到外面丢掉了。

entry.tran: 慢步走;迈着沉重的脚步走
entry.def: If you say that someone is trundling somewhere, you mean that they are walking slowly, often in a tired way or with heavy steps.

example.ex: Girls trundle in carrying heavy book bags.
example.tran: 背着沉重书包的女孩们慢慢走进来。

means.word_mean: 1. a low bed to be slid under a higher bed

auth_sentence.content: Lopsided rhythms trundle away underneath shiny, synthetic melodies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lopsided rhythms trundle away underneath shiny, synthetic melodies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lopsided rhythms trundle away underneath shiny, synthetic melodies.

auth_sentence.content: That station gone, our caboose took up again its easy trundle.
auth_sentence.res_content: That station gone, our caboose took up again its easy trundle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That station gone, our caboose took up again its easy trundle.

auth_sentence.content: Small, painted open tourist buses and horses and carts trundle through its streets.
auth_sentence.res_content: Small, painted open tourist buses and horses and carts trundle through its streets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Small, painted open tourist buses and horses and carts trundle through its streets.

sentences.en: A wagon trundled up the road.
sentences.cn: 运货车沿着路艰难地向上移动。

sentences.en: The fruit seller trundled his cart along the street.
sentences.cn: 卖水果的小贩推着他的车子在街上艰难地走着。

sentences.en: I trundled along to the information desk.
The government trundled out the same old clichs to justify their actions.
sentences.cn: 政府搬出一堆老掉牙的理由为自己的做法辩护。
